name: The Eldorado Coffee Company
description: Located on the Eldorado Mezzanine outside of Millies, The Eldorado Coffee Company features coffee, teas, cappuccinos, espressos, lattes, mochas, Italian sodas, fresh-churned creamy gelato, grab-and-go sandwiches, wraps, and the finest fresh pastries made on site. Also offering freshly squeezed orange juice for a refreshing start to any morning.
shortDescription: Mezzanine coffee shop with espresso drinks, gelato, pastries, and grab-and-go at the Eldorado.

faqs.question: Where is the Eldorado Coffee Company?
faqs.answer: On the Mezzanine level, just outside Millies restaurant.

faqs.question: Do they have food?
faqs.answer: Yes, grab-and-go sandwiches, wraps, fresh pastries, and gelato.

faqs.question: What coffee drinks are available?
faqs.answer: Coffee, teas, cappuccinos, espressos, lattes, mochas, and Italian sodas.

meta.title: Eldorado Coffee Company – Coffee & Pastries at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Start your day with fresh-roasted coffee, gelato, and pastries at The Eldorado Coffee Company on the Mezzanine level.
